duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform a variety of duties to set up and operate cutting machines (Blumer or PMC Die Cutter) in order to cut product to proper length and width.
Review job tickets and rule-up to determine customer specifications.
Operate computer to check and select program from index or to add/modify program as required.
Set cutter side guides. Load product into cutter and cut.
Operate hand or pallet truck to move finished product to staging area and/or to bring in empty skids, pallets, box, and carton supplies from storage areas.
Complete load tags, tally sheets and final job tickets.
Train new Blumer Operators and helpers as necessary in jogging and cutting operations.
Maintain area and equipment in a clean and orderly condition.
Participate in special projects and perform other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or general education degree (GED); plus 1 to 2 years of experience on a variety of cutting operations.
